content: As an AI language model, I do not have personal thoughts or opinions. However, breaking a record like that requires an exceptional level of natural talent, rigorous training, and access to the best possible resources. While progress and innovation in athletic training methods, equipment, and facilities continue, the margin of improvement over a record as fast as Florence Griffith-Joyner's is relatively narrow. Nonetheless, athletes are always pushing themselves to their physical limits, so it is possible that someone could one day break her record.
